description: This file defines an asynchronous function to run an agent that interacts with a vector database (Qdrant) using specified tools and models, and executes a sample query related to the extinction event of dinosaurs.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools to perform tasks.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A model class, likely representing a Google Gemini language model.

classes.name: MCPTools
classes.description: Tools for interacting with the Model Context Protocol (MCP) in the vector database.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Asynchronous function that initializes the MCPTools, creates an Agent with specific instructions, and processes a message stream.
